thread.title: KCMO Public Library throws the books at Toronto
thread.title_full: KCMO Public Library throws the books at Toronto - KCTV5

author: Michael Portman, Digital Producer
title: KCMO Public Library throws the books at Toronto
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - The KCMO Public Library is joining in on the ALCS fight by tweeting out a picture of three of their books after the Royals smashed their way to a Game 4 victory.
The book titles read "Canada, Sorry You Lost, What Bluebirds Do."
In their tweet, they used the hashtag #bookspinepoetry and tweeted it out to the Toronto Blue Jays organization and the Toronto library. 
Library trash talk at its finest.    

Some #bookspinepoetry for our friends @BlueJays & @torontolibrary #TaketheCrown #GoRoyals #ALCS pic.twitter.com/Zj5ZvhFljv 
â€” KCMO Public Library (@KCLibrary) October 20, 2015
